name: Gradually Forward
description:
The game is divided into two teams, each team can join more than one person.
Before the start, players are free to join a group of teams. After the start, After starting the game, players can pick up the equipment and defeat the enemy members at the same time.
When the number of defeated enemy members reaches a certain number, the enemy will appear in the 'guard area'.
Teams that appear to be in a protected area should quickly return to their own and be ready to defend within the allotted time.
The 'defending party' is to prevent the 'attacking party' from taking over. The 'guard area' will appear for a certain period of time, and One team will win the game.
The rules of the game will come up many times, when a party's 'successful occupation' number reached a certain number of times will be the final victory.
